body:
#### PR description:

Add new access code for scintillator cell parameters from HGCal geometry

#### PR validation:

Tested with private code and is being used by users for HGCal related studies

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No back porting needed
title: Phase2-hgx195 Add new access code for scintillator cells of HGCal
